hits.definition:
疑

[yí] (怀疑 huáiyí) doubt, suspect; 迟疑 chíyí hesitate

攻

[gōng] (=进攻 jìngōng, =攻击 gōngjī) attack; 专攻 specialize in studying

纸 (F 紙)

[zhǐ] paper; 报纸 bàozhǐ newspaper

策

[cè] plan; 政策 zhèngcè policy

充

[chōng] fill; 充分 chōngfèn full, ample; 充满 chōngmǎn full of

顶 (F 頂)

[dǐng] top, <classifier for hats etc.>; 一顶帽子 yì dǐng màozi a hat

寻 (F 尋)

[xún] (=寻找 xúnzhǎo) seek

[xín] 寻思 xínsi

宁 (F 寧)

[nìng] (=宁愿 nìngyuàn, 宁可 jìngkě) prefer, rather

[níng] 宁静 tranquil

沙

[shā] sand; 沙漠 shāmò desert; 沙丘 shāqiū dune; 沙

发 shāfā <loan> sofa

防

[fáng] embankment, guard, protect, anti-

抓

[zhuā] grab, seize, arrest, attract, scratch

例

[lì] (=例子 lìzi) example; 例如 lìrú for instance

股

[gǔ] thigh, section

卖 (F 賣)

[mài] sell; 苹果怎么卖? Píngguǒ zěnme mài? How much are the apples?

顺 (F 順)

[shùn] along, in the same direction as, obey, suitable

警

[jǐng] 警察 jǐngchá police; 警告 jǐnggào warn

梦 (F 夢)

[mèng] dream

剧 (F 劇)

[jù] drama, play, opera; 剧烈 jùliè severe

善

[shàn] good; 改善 gǎishàn improve; 善于 be good at
